DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of the current study is to look into the pathogenesis of a severe medical condition causing acute episodes on the central nervous system as seen in majority of patients with liver cirrhosis.
DOC.brief_title: Brain Energy Metabolism in Patients With Chronic Liver Disease and Impaired Central Nervous System
DOC.criteria: 6 patients with liver cirrhosis with an acute episode of hepatic encephalopathy, 6 patients with liver cirrhosis without an acute episode of hepatic encephalopathy, 6 healthy subjects age and sex matched Neurological and/or psychiatric condition, Nontreated diabetes, Pregnancy/breastfeeding
